籤詩版本二:
Mwadzidzidzi kalata inawulukira kumwamba, ndipo boti lodzaza ndi chuma chochokera ku phiri la Tai linabwerera.
Ukafunsa za ulendowu, zikhala zabwino.Pali anthu olemekezeka patsogolo panu omwe amavomereza.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi ikuyimira kupindula kwa kutchuka ndi chuma.
Zonse zikuyenda bwino.
解曰:
Mukafunsa za kutchuka. Pali munthu wolemekezeka pamaso panu. Kuwonjezera chisangalalo. Chuma chochuluka.
Chilichonse chimayenda bwino ndi chizindikiro ichi. Mulole izo zipite bwino.
籤詩故事一:
◇Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
Wei Pei, wophunzira wosauka, ali ndi zaka pafupifupi makumi anayi. Potsogolera buluwo kuwoloka mlatho wa Luoyang, msodzi wina pamlathopo anali atatsala pang'ono kupha kamba wamkulu kuti amugulitse. Koma analibe ndalama, choncho anasintha buluyo ndi kamba n’kumutulutsa pansi pa mlathowo. Kuyambira pamenepo, Wei Pei adapambana mayeso achifumu ndipo adakwezedwa paudindo wapamwamba.
(Nkhaniyi imagwiritsa ntchito lingaliro laluso la "kamba wamkulu adakumana ndi Wei Pei ndipo adapulumutsidwa" pofotokoza lotale iyi. Wei Pei adakhala wanzeru chifukwa cha izi, chifukwa adakumana ndi "kamba wamkulu" uyu.)
聖意: Ngati nyumbayo ili patsogolo panu, mudzakhala ndi mwayi, ndipo mudzatha kufunafuna chuma, mwayi, bizinesi, ndi ukwati.
古人: Wei Pei Yu Xian (Wei Pei Yu Xian)
第X籤: Chizindikiro cha makumi asanu ndi anayi
